atk-s0517a21:2_0: 34. Idāni samasīsakathānantaraṁ attanā vuttassa iddhipāṭihāriyassa sādhake satta
atk-s0517a21:2_1: anupassanāvisese dassentena kathitāya suttantapubbaṅgamāya satipaṭṭhānakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a21:2_2: Tattha suttante tāva cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo, tena na tato heṭṭhā, na uddhanti
atk-s0517a21:2_3: satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṁ dīpeti. Imeti niddisitabbanidassanaṁ. Bhikkhaveti dhammapaṭiggāhakapuggalālapanaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:2_4: Satipaṭṭhānāti tayo satipaṭṭhānā satigocaropi, tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno
atk-s0517a21:2_7: vutto. Tassattho – patiṭṭhāti tasminti paṭṭhānaṁ. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṁ satipaṭṭhānanti.
atk-s0517a21:3_0: ‘‘Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī’’ti
atk-s0517a21:3_1: (ma. ni. 3.304, 311) ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā
atk-s0517a21:3_3: attho. Kena paṭṭhapetabbatoti? Satiyā. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṁ satipaṭṭhānanti. ‘‘Cattāro
atk-s0517a21:3_4: satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 3.147)
atk-s0517a21:3_5: pana satiyeva ‘‘satipaṭṭhāna’’nti vuttā. Tassattho – patiṭṭhātīti paṭṭhānaṁ, upaṭṭhāti
atk-s0517a21:3_6: okkanditvā pakkhanditvā vattatīti attho. Satiyeva paṭṭhānaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ. Atha vā
atk-s0517a21:3_7: saraṇaṭṭhena sati, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena upaṭṭhānaṁ. Iti sati ca sā upaṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:3_8: Idamidha adhippetaṁ. Yadi evaṁ kasmā satipaṭṭhānāti bahuvacanaṁ katanti? Satibahuttā.
atk-s0517a21:4_0: Katame cattāroti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Idhāti imasmiṁ sāsane. Bhikkhūti saṁsāre bhayaṁ
atk-s0517a21:4_1: ikkhatīti bhikkhu. Sesapadānaṁ atthavaṇṇanā panettha sutamayañāṇakathāya maggasaccaniddesavaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttāyevāti.
atk-s0517a21:5_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti? Veneyyahitattā.
atk-s0517a21:5_2: dvedhā pavattesu mandassa taṇhācaritassa oḷārikaṁ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ visuddhimaggo,
atk-s0517a21:5_3: tikkhassa sukhumaṁ vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ. Diṭṭhicaritassāpi mandassa nātippabhedagataṁ
atk-s0517a21:5_5: Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena adhigantabbanimittaṁ paṭhamaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0517a21:5_6: visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa oḷārikārammaṇe asaṇṭhahanato dutiyaṁ. Vipassanāyānikassapi
atk-s0517a21:5_7: mandassa nātippabhedagatārammaṇaṁ tatiyaṁ, tikkhassa atippabhedagatārammaṇaṁ catutthaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:6_0: Subhasukhaniccaattavipallāsappahānatthaṁ vā. Kāyo hi asubho, tattha ca subhavipallāsavipallatthā
atk-s0517a21:6_1: sattā. Tesaṁ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṁ paṭhamaṁ
atk-s0517a21:6_2: satipaṭṭhānaṁ vuttaṁ. Sukhaṁ niccaṁ attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā,
atk-s0517a21:6_3: cittaṁ aniccaṁ, dhammā anattā, tesu ca sukhaniccaattavipallāsavipallatthā sattā.
atk-s0517a21:6_4: Tesaṁ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṁ vipallāsānaṁ pahānatthaṁ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti
atk-s0517a21:6_5: evaṁ subhasukhaniccaattavipallāsappahānatthaṁ vā cattārova vuttā. Na kevalañca vipallāsappahānatthameva,
atk-s0517a21:7_0: 35. (Ka) suttantaniddese pathavīkāyanti imasmiṁ rūpakāye pathavīdhātu. Sakalasarīre
atk-s0517a21:7_1: pana pathavīdhātūnaṁ bahukattā sabbapathavīdhātusaṅgahatthaṁ samūhatthena kāyaggahaṇaṁ
atk-s0517a21:7_2: kataṁ. Āpokāyādīsupi eseva nayo. Kesakāyādīnampi bahukattā kesakāyādigahaṇaṁ kataṁ.
atk-s0517a21:7_3: Vakkādīni pana paricchinnattā kāyaggahaṇaṁ nārahantīti tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ na katanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:8_0: (Kha) sukhaṁvedanantiādīsu sukhaṁ vedananti kāyikaṁ vā cetasikaṁ vā sukhaṁ vedanaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:8_1: Tathā dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ. Adukkhamasukhaṁ vedananti pana cetasikameva upekkhāvedanaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:8_2: Sāmisaṁ sukhaṁ vedananti cha gehasitasomanassavedanā. Nirāmisaṁ sukhaṁ vedananti
atk-s0517a21:8_3: cha nekkhammasitasomanassavedanā . Sāmisaṁ dukkhaṁ vedananti cha gehasitadomanassavedanā.
atk-s0517a21:8_4: Nirāmisaṁ dukkhaṁ vedananti cha nekkhammasitadomanassavedanā. Sāmisaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ
atk-s0517a21:8_5: vedananti cha gehasitaupekkhāvedanā. Nirāmisaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ vedananti cha nekkhammasitaupekkhāvedanā.
atk-s0517a21:10_0: (Gha) tadavasese dhammeti tehi kāyavedanācittehi avasese tebhūmakadhamme. Sabbattha
atk-s0517a21:10_1: tena ñāṇenāti tena sattavidhena anupassanāñāṇena. Yāni panettha antarantarā avuttatthāni,
